name: Fragile Factory
description:
You are working in the "Fragile Factory"! You have to pack the eggs and the wine glasses in their boxes without breaking any.  Use the items in the store to help. Try to beat the seven levels. Good luck!

Controls

Use the arrow Keys A and D to rotate the items.  Right click to remove an item and get your money back. Click R to restart the level.

Instructions

Can you make it through the 7 levels? Build a path to bring the items in the boxes. Buy items to help you. You can sell them to get your money back. Be careful, you can ran out of money!

If you solve the 7 levels, please leave a comment as we want to know!
